alert.note: Alert for Pennington; Polk; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:18PM CDT until July 13 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Red Lake County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Western Pennington County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 318 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Grand Forks, or near Grand Forks, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... East Grand Forks, Euclid, Angus, Huot, Dorothy, Mallory and Davidson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
